invalidFormatChar@proto: each character of 'format' argument must be one of [xscfdbhilqBHILQ], value: {{-value,valueType}}
invalidFormatChar@hades: each character of ~[format] argument must be one of ~{xscfdbhilqBHILQ}, value {{-value,valueType@hades}}
invalidConstructorParam@proto: 'raw' argument must be one of type string, number or an instance of Buffer, value: {{-value,valueType}}
invalidConstructorParam@hades: ~[raw] argument must be one of type ~{string}, ~{number} or an instance of ~{Buffer}, value {{-value,valueType@hades}}
invalidSeekParam@proto: 'position' argument must be of type number, value: {{-value,valueType}}
invalidSeekParam@hades: ~[position] argument must be of type ~{number}, value {{-value,valueType@hades}}
invalidSkipParam@proto: 'offset' argument must be of type number, value: {{-value,valueType}}
invalidSkipParam@hades: ~[offset] argument must be of type ~{number}, value {{-value,valueType@hades}}
invalidSliceParam@proto: 'size' argument must be of type number, value: {{-value,valueType}}
invalidSliceParam@hades: ~[size] argument must be of type ~{number}, value {{-value,valueType@hades}}
